item.title: Introduction
item.description: LLaMatters = LLaMa + Matters ðŸ”—ChatGPT & Beyond ðŸ”— As a user, ChatGPT is helpful. For many, it is an easy way to answer detailed questions or write essays and emails. But for those who wish to learn more, it can be a gateway into the world of large language models (LLMs), generative text, and context-aware responses.
